camera_gear.model: Phase One XT Camera System (Medium Format)
camera_gear.lens: Rodenstock HR Digaron-W 40mm f/4 (With vertical shift)

lighting_setup.weather: Heavy cloud cover creating a giant softbox effect
lighting_setup.artificial_light: Subtle 6000K interior office lighting visible through glazing, balancing the exterior flatness

color_grading.palette: Minimalist High-Key; Faint light yellow accents from windows
color_grading.contrast: Low global contrast, High local micro-contrast (structure emphasis)

atmosphere.feeling: Architectural purity and structural weightlessness (Cantilever effect)

technical_quality.post_processing: Zero-distortion correction, Keystone correction (perfectly vertical lines), Exposure blending for interior lights
technical_quality.dynamic_range: High (retaining texture in the bright white sky and the dark interior windows)
